Personal Training

Home Services Personal Training

How many times have you been in the gym working out on your own or with a friend and felt you weren’t getting the results you want? It’s a common thing in many gyms; members come in and get ‘fitter’ but then reach a plateau after a couple of weeks. Frustratingly the fat doesn’t come off, or the muscle mass doesn’t increase or the goal they have set themself doesn’t get any closer. Unsurprisingly some people give up and miss out on the benefits that regular exercise brings.

By working with the Business of Fitness you get expert instruction that’s designed for you with your goal at the centre of the programme.

Regular One on One Personal training combined with an individualised fitness programme is the most effective way to reach your goal.

Personal Training rates from: $40 for a 30 minute session

                                                  $65 for a 60 minute session

Monthly Programme rates from: Combine with your PT session (monthly fee applies)

 

What my clients say:

"Having recently emigrated from the UK I wanted to maintain my fitness level so I joined a local community recreation centre in East Auckland where I became a regular attendee at Lee's Boot-camp sessions. His approach was very professional and knowledgeable, concentrating on general fitness in a serious but fun atmosphere. Each session was structured differently to give a full body workout but in an enjoyable fashion.

After nearly a 20 year layoff, my wife also wanted to return to keep-fit. Following an interview, Lee formulated a personalised training programme allowing her to build up her fitness level in a structured manner whilst taking into consideration her limitations''  

Bill and Jane H.

"When Lee says ‘I have fun things in store for you today,’ what he really means is I’m going to see how close I can take you to death and back. Every night before a training session my prayers would end with a plea that Lee take it easy on me followed by dreams of me begging Lee to stop making me do burpees. It began to occur to me that that there was a problem brewing when I started making a voodoo doll of Lee, but it wasn’t until I started using it after the 5th session with him that it really didn’t work because he could still walk. So I decided to address the real issue. I was fat, lazy and inconsistent and all he was trying to do was to help me be fit, active and consistent" 

Matesha A.

“Lee Jones is a great personal trainer - very professional, knowledgeable and with an appropriately dark sense of humour when putting you through your paces”

 James E.

For a free, no obligation face to face or online meeting, or phone call, you can contact me below to arrange a time to discuss your fitness goal or goals. 

 

 

Please contact me for further information or to get started.
